definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="96" y="57"><field name="trigger">player_critical_hit</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="custom_dependency_logic"><field name="NAME">isvanillacritical</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="is_equipped"><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:WitheredGauntlet</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="entity_haspotioneffect"><field name="potion">WITHER</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_add_potion_advanced"><field name="potion">WITHER</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">40</field></block></value><value name="ambient"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><value name="particles"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></statement></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
